short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Google Search Console with one click. With this extension you can view the search console data from any tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Ditch the endless tab juggling! This Chrome extension puts Google Search Console at your fingertips with just a single click. Seamlessly access and analyze your website's performance data directly from any tab you're browsing. 
No more switching back and forth – stay in your workflow and gain instant insights into your search engine ranking and optimization potential. 📊✨

Key features of search console everywhere chrome extension

🔍 One-click access: Skip tab switching and frustration! It only takes one click to get your data from Google Search Console no matter which web page you are on. 🚀
📈 Real-time insights: Without closing the browsing mode. Have real-time updates regarding your website’s performance in terms of SEO, page rankings, and errors. 🔄
🎯 Enhanced convenience: Do not switch to the workflow but gain valuable ideas without interrupting browsing. 🌐
🔗 Seamless integration: Uncomplicated setup, no need for additional tools. It connects seamlessly with your current Google Search Console account. 🤝
📱 Mobile-friendly: You can check your website’s SEO information whenever and wherever you want. 🌐📲
How to use
🌐 Visit the Chrome Web Store.
🔍 Enter “Search Console Everywhere” in the search bar.
🛒 To install it, click the extension in search results and then select “Add to Chrome”.
📌 Once it’s installed, the extension icon should show up in your Chrome toolbar, usually near the address bar.
🚀 After activation of the extension, it should enable you to view Google Search Console data without switching tabs on any web page.
🌍 Explore live updates of your website’s performance, SEO stats, page rankings, and possible errors without changing tabs while browsing.
🤝 The extension should meld perfectly with your existing Google Search Console account that does not require additional tools.
